text:
are you a paid llm model
I am a large language model, trained by Google.  

Whether or not my use is considered "paid" depends on the context.  Google offers various services powered by LLMs like me, some of which are free (like Bard's free tier) and some of which are paid (like access through the Vertex AI platform).  So, while *I* don't directly receive payment, my underlying technology is used in both free and paid services.

good boy
While I appreciate the sentiment, I'm not a person or a pet, so terms like "good boy" don't really apply to me. I'm just here to help answer your questions and provide information.

cool
Cool.  Is there anything I can help you with today?
